content.rendered:
DELIVERING WORLD-CLASS PIPING SYSTEMS FOR OVER
100 YEARS

Find The Product Solution That Suits Your Piping Requirements

PERMA-PIPE International Holdings, Inc. (NASDAQ:PPIH) is a global engineered pipe services company offering brands in ANTI-CORROSION COATING, INSULATION, CONTAINMENT, FABRICATION, and LEAK DETECTION SYSTEMS. With over 100 years of product manufacturing and service delivery expertise meeting globally recognized industry standards and ISO 9001 certification.

No matter what your piping requirements are, we are confident that our piping systems will add value to your project.

Meet Our Pipe Systems

Elevate your project experience with the new PERMA-PIPE pipe systems to meet your specific requirements that provide peace of mind, value, and convenience.

OUR PRODUCTS

A comprehensive, full-service solution from end-to-end and throughout your project life cycle. Our products provide innovative piping features, design and engineering support, and fabrication capabilities for a custom-fit solution to meet your performance requirements.

INSULATION

CONTAINMENT

ANTI-CORROSION COATINGS

FABRICATED

FABRICATED STEEL MANHOLES

INSULATED CONDUCTOR CASING

LEAK DETECTION

PAL-AT/TS®

PAL-AT®

LiquidWatch II®

FLUIDWATCH®

FLUIDWATCH II®

Let’s Talk About Your Next Project

Get started with PERMA-PIPE

Quality Matters

Our Quality Management Systems have been certified to conform to the strict requirements of ISO 9001.

Our Quality
